author: Morgan Chalfant
title: White House seeks $6.4B from Congress in Ukraine-related aid | TheHill
description: The White House is asking Congress to approve $6.4 billion in additional fun...
content:
The White House is asking Congress to approve $6.4 billion in additional funding to help respond to the ongoing Russian invasion in Ukraine, two sources confirmed to The Hill.   
The request include… [+2244 chars]
